name: hogsync-monorepo
description: Type-safe PostHog feature flags with automated sync - Monorepo

scripts.build: bun run build:cli && bun run build:react
scripts.typecheck: bun run typecheck:cli && bun run typecheck:react
scripts.release:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:rc: npm version prerelease --preid=rc && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push --follow-tags origin main

author: Stephen Byrne
